text: I've had Olive Kitteridge on my re-watch list for a couple of years, finally got to it, and it was as good as I remembered. It's the kind of story HBO excels at, they have a deep library of shows like this, many of which I've never seen. Unfortunately HBO's owners decided that this unique library doesn't deserve to stand alone. They used its name to host a cheap Netflix clone called HBO Max, and filled it with crap, among which the HBO gems are buried. Sorry I know some people like superhero movies, I used to, but there's a glut and they're all the same, I can't watch any of them. I just want a simple interface for the HBO library. I guess the message is that HBO had no future, so let's just use what goodwill remains to throw a Hail Mary pass at Netflix. Meanwhile Apple seems to be aiming for the position HBO used to own.,
